message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This product not only represents a significant investment but also carries a legacy that I believe could be of great importance to you. Considering its rarity and the time spent crafting it, I am extending this offer at a price of $2000000. I understand that the true value of such items can be subjective, and I am open to discussing any concerns or counteroffers you might have. Let's embark on a conversation to explore the possibilities of this transaction and ensure that both parties benefit from this exceptional opportunity.
